Minera San Xavier bụ onye enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ Canada New Gold Inc
nke na-arụ ọrụ na ebe a na-egwupụta ọlaedo na ọlaọcha na nso Cerro de San Pedro, obodo San Luis Potosí dị naanị kilomita 12 site na isi obodo nke steeti ahụ
Obodo San Luis Potosí tọrọ ntọala mgbe a chọtara ọla edo n'ugwu ndị dị nso na Cerro de San Pedro na narị afọ nke iri na ise.

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emebiela mkpebi iwu megide ọrụ ya site na ịhazi akụ na ụba na ikike gburugburu ebe obibi nke Mexico, Secretariat of the Environment and Natural Resources (Secretaría de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales, Semarnat), na-akpali ha ileghara nyocha gburugburu ebe obibi anya nke ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị nweere onwe ha mere ma kama ịnabata ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nweere onwe ya yana ụlọ ọrụ na-akwado na gọọmentị chọrọ ọmụmụ ihe.  Nnyocha na-aga n'ihu n'ime na n'èzí nke ọrụ igwu ala emepụtaghị ihe akaebe ọ bụla nke mmetọ ruo ugbu a.

Na 5 Febụwarị 2007, Pro San Luis Ecológico, A.C., tinyere akwụkwọ n'ihu Commission for Environmental Cooperation n'okpuru Nkeji edemede 14(1) nke North American Agreement on Environmental Cooperations
Onye nrubeisi ahụ kwuputara na Mexico anaghị eme ka iwu gburugburu ebe obibi ya rụọ ọrụ nke ọma n'ihe gbasara ikike nke ọrụ Cerro de San Pedro na San San Luis Potos
Na nrubeisi SEM-07-001 (Minera San Xavier), onye nrubeisi ahụ kwuru na n'April 2006 Semarnat mebiri ụlọikpe Mexico site n'inye ikike Minera San Xavier oru ngo nke ugboro abụọ
Na 15 Julaị 2009, CEC Secretariat kpebiri ịghara ịkwado mmepe nke nyocha eziokwu.
